content.html: It feels really objectionably stupid for great people to have to leave companies they love because of org chart inflexibility. But every exception and one-off creates it's own organizational debt, and often cynicism and equity issues over special treatment.
content.value:
It feels really objectionably stupid for great people to have to leave companies they love because of org chart inflexibility.

But every exception and one-off creates it's own organizational debt, and often cynicism and equity issues over special treatment.
